    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply()
      apply() applies the ZBuffer state information contained in this JOGLZBufferState object to the underlying JOGL OpenGL implementation, but only if this JOGLZBufferState is enabled.
      ZBufferStateRecord createStateRecord()
      Returns a new ZBufferStateRecord usable for holding state information for this JOGLZBufferState.

      • apply

        public void apply()
        apply() applies the ZBuffer state information contained in this JOGLZBufferState object to the underlying JOGL OpenGL implementation, but only if this JOGLZBufferState is enabled.
        Specified by:

        public ZBufferStateRecord createStateRecord()
